title: Dalai Lama - Eight Verses for Training the Mind (AudioBook 4 CDs
description:
Eight Verses for Training the Mind [AUDIOBOOK] (Audio CD)

==========

This CD-set contains the complete teaching and commentary by His Holiness on the Eight Verses as well as his conferring the Generation of Bodhicitta Mind.

==========

# Audio CD
# Publisher: Snow Lion Publications (April 25, 2006)
# Language: English
# ISBN-10: 1559392401
# ISBN-13: 978-1559392402

===========

All 4 discs ripped to MP3:

	264kbps
	2ch Stereo
	44khz

Total Duration: about 3.4 hours

===========

I purchased this, and if you enjoy the words of HH the 14th Dalai Lama, the teachings of Buddhism, or Tibetan culture, please do your part to support the survival of Tibet, its people, and its return to freedom from China.
